prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a long body and vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles an aquatic creature with unique fins and patterns.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its tail for swimming gracefully through oceans.
Design a Pokemon that has striking blue and orange colors with an elongated shape.
Give me a description of a Pokemon that thrives in underwater habitats and has special features.
Generate a visual of a serpentine Pokemon with a playful personality and vivid colors.
Make a concept for a Pokemon that uses its glowing markings to attract prey in the deep sea.
